Activity: Log in to the system, check emails. Start the day with a cup of coffee and a quick check of game development news.
Begin implementing the core gameplay feature of quests. Start by designing a simple quest system that allows players to accept quests from NPCs and complete them to earn rewards.
Email @NDes-1 and @LVDn-1 to discuss the integration of quests into the game's narrative and level design. Topic: "Quest Integration Meeting"
Lunch break. Enjoy a quiet lunch at my desk while listening to a podcast.
Meeting with @NDes-1 and @LVDn-1 to discuss quest integration. Brainstorm ideas for interesting and engaging quests that fit the game's world and story.
Continue implementing the quest system. Add support for different quest types, such as fetch quests, kill quests, and escort quests.
Document the progress made on the quest system. Identify any challenges or areas that need further attention.
